name: Yuuki and Friends
description:
Yuuki was born in a very small town.
She always liked the supernatural world and horror movies.
Yuuki has an allergy that doesn't let her bathe in sunlight.
And she is always treated like a weird person.
When Yuuki walks down the sidewalk people cross to the other side of the street. Yuuki likes to talk, but people always avoid her.

Now, Yuuki moved to a big city.  She wants to make friends, even if they are dead.
